articles.author: Stefano Pozzebon, Kara Fox and Megan Janetsky, CNN
articles.title: Colombia becomes latest Latin American country to partially decriminalize abortion - CNN
articles.description: Colombia became the latest country in Latin America to partially decriminalize abortion on Monday, marking a major victory for the nation's feminist movements and reflecting a wider shift in views toward the procedure across the region.
